name: Get Out Of My Stomach!
description:
You have been eaten by a great beast and must now use your trusty hookshot to escape.  

A,D move the player left and right

W,A,S,D points your hookshot in a specific direction 

E fires the hookshot and if it hits something, it will pull the player towards it

Reach the top of the beast's stomach and grab onto his uvula to escape.
